entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
